Package com.ae2dms.Business.Data

Class GameRecord

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Business.Data.GameRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The Game record class to store all records has inner class named Record to store single record
See Also:
GameRecord.Record, Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameRecord.Record
    Inner Record class, representing the data of every record

    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty bestRecord

    private java.lang.Integer mapHashCode
    the hashcode generated by every unique mapSet, used for verifying that the reading saveFile is valid
    private java.lang.String mapName
    MapSet Name of this record, used for data retrieving from records savefile
    private java.util.ArrayList<GameRecord.Record> records
    The ArrayList to store all records, sorted by steps in ascending order

    Produce a List of Records, sorted by time duration of records in ascending order

      the hashcode generated by every unique mapSet, used for verifying that the reading saveFile is valid

  • Method Details

    • pushRecord

      public void pushRecord​(int steps, java.lang.String playerName, int durationSeconds)
      create a record and push to records list, will sort and update @bestRecord accordingly will set the record adding time to now()
      Parameters:
      steps - the total moved steps of this turn
      playerName - the inputted name by user when game complete
      durationSeconds - the duration seconds that timer recorded

    • pushRecord

      private void pushRecord​(int steps, java.util.Date date, java.lang.String playerName, int durationSeconds)
      create a record and push to records list, will sort and update @bestRecord accordingly will set the record adding time to the given one
      Parameters:
      steps - the total moved steps of this turn
      playerName - the inputted name by user when game complete
      durationSeconds - the duration seconds that timer recorded

    • writeChangesToFile

      private void writeChangesToFile()
      write the changes make by pushing records to the defined output file the filepath is namely $(user.dir)/records/$(mapName)$(mapHashcode).rec

    • sortRecords

      private void sortRecords()
      sort the records by steps in ascending order

    • sortRecordsByTime

      public java.util.List<GameRecord.Record> sortRecordsByTime()
      Produce a List of Records, sorted by time duration of records in ascending order
      Returns:
      a unmodifiable list of sorted list

    • getRecords

      public java.util.List<GameRecord.Record> getRecords()
      Get a unmodifiableList of all records, sorted by steps in ascending order
      Returns:
      getter of records

    • restoreRecords

      public void restoreRecords​(java.lang.String mapName, java.lang.Integer mapHashCode)
      to read permanent record from the $(user.dir)/records/$(mapName)$(mapHashcode).rec if not found, then create the directory or file
      Parameters:
      mapName - name of the mapSet
      mapHashCode - hashcode of the mapSet, for verify the map in case maps with same name but different content
